mapper.insert: INSERT INTO match_record ( tournament_id, stage_id, group_id, player1_id, player2_id, player1_score, player2_score, winner_id, status, start_time, end_time, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{tournamentId}, #{stageId}, #{groupId}, #{player1Id}, #{player2Id}, #{player1Score}, #{player2Score}, #{winnerId}, #{status}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, tournament_id, stage_id, group_id, player1_id, player2_id, player1_score, player2_score, winner_id, status, start_time, end_time, created_at, updated_at FROM match_record WHERE stage_id = #{stageId} ORDER BY created_at ASC

SELECT id, tournament_id, stage_id, group_id, player1_id, player2_id, player1_score, player2_score, winner_id, status, start_time, end_time, created_at, updated_at FROM match_record WHERE group_id = #{groupId} ORDER BY created_at ASC

SELECT id, tournament_id, stage_id, group_id, player1_id, player2_id, player1_score, player2_score, winner_id, status, start_time, end_time, created_at, updated_at FROM match_record WHERE tournament_id = #{tournamentId} AND stage_id = #{stageId} ORDER BY created_at ASC

mapper.update: UPDATE match_record SET tournament_id = #{tournamentId}, stage_id = #{stageId}, group_id = #{groupId}, player1_id = #{player1Id}, player2_id = #{player2Id}, player1_score = #{player1Score}, player2_score = #{player2Score}, winner_id = #{winnerId}, status = #{status}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
